jcckit.plot
Interface Hint

All Known Subinterfaces:
AttributesHint
All Known Implementing Classes:
PositionHint, ShapeAttributesHint
public interface Hint

Marker interface of all types of hints. Hints are used to calculate GraphicalElement representing a point in a Curve. For example, in a chart with stacked bars the data determines the height of a bar but the foot of a bar is determined by the height of the bar below. Its value will be stored in a PositionHint.

Author:
Franz-Josef Elmer
